name: Monica Rambeau
aliases: Spectrum,  Captain Marvel , Photon, Pulsar, Daystar, Sceptre, Lady of Light, Monica Marvel, Sun Goddess, Spectrum
powersText: Can convert body into any form of energy within the electromagnetic spectrum.{{Clear}}Energy generation, absorption & manipulation.{{Clear}} Travel at speeds up to the speed of light while in her energy form.{{Clear}} Able to travel in energy form through the vacuum of space.
